mapper.select:
select distinct bm.* from bookmark bm left join bookmark_tag bt on bm.id = bt.bookmark_id left join tag t on bt.tag_id = t.id
bm.user_id = #{userId}
and bm.is_deleted = 0
and bm.is_deleted = 0 and bm.is_starred = 1
and bm.is_deleted = 1 and (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + '30 day') <= delete_time
and t.name = #{bookmarkSearchDTO.keyword}
order by bm.create_time desc
